title: [Placements] When will Goldman Sachs release shortlist for Ops role?
content: We had written the GS OA on 2nd September, but they still havenâ€™t released the shortlist for interviews.

comments.body: First of all their website was trash it couldn't handle the load couldn't upload only

It is an open campus opportunity for 3 clg pes,psg and one more was there; They generally release shortlist after 1-2 week of aptitude test; And generally they don't send shortlist, they directly send an email to all shortlisted ones to take up the coding assessment.
Is there a coding assessment for Operations Role?
It's not an operations role; They are hiring for operation team/division, the role includes design of technology as well, so it will include coding assessment.
Oh okay wasn't aware of this. Thank you
Bro thereâ€™s no coding, itâ€™s Operations Role. After OA, there will be GD, and then interview. Confirmed it with a senior
Oh ok, then why are they even hiring from b.tech; Like what's the point of hiring btech people for an operations role.
You wonâ€™t be coding. Youâ€™ll be using tools like Power BI, Alteryx, Tableau.
Did Anyone get Goldman Sachs shortlist ?
